html:
5.5.18  10:04 pm   good thing you wrote the word "whenst" on the screen or else i might've heard "whence." did you consider this when making the visuals for the song?

     absolutely. i am very keen on captioning things, particularly at the tricky spots

5.5.18  9:58 pm   Why do we try?

     to maybe succeed?

5.5.18  9:50 pm   do all your songs state true things

     no

      (e.g. I'm from the West Coast)?

5.5.18  9:13 pm   Have you ever had a song idea that you tried expanding, but you would up using the new thing for the basis of a different song, and then when you try to expand that new song you make another part that you decide to use for a new new song idea and so on and so forth until you have a billion trillion song ideas and are drowning in unfinished projects? How can I make this stop? 

     if you get an irrelevant tangent, log it separately in your songs list, but keep working on the one you were working on and keep searching for what is right for that one

5.5.18  7:23 pm   Cats dressed up as tacos or tacos that look like cats?

     from the attachment you gave it appears to be tacos dressed like tacos, which you wouldn't think would be necessary but that's what it seems to be

5.5.18  7:03 pm   where you dropped on your head

     i did it myself

5.5.18  6:59 pm   Are any questions better than others?

     every question is better than every other

5.5.18  6:24 pm   quantity or quality?

     how about both

5.5.18  6:08 pm   is there a stone you can't lift?

     i'm sure there is

5.5.18  6:07 pm   Does something exist if it can't be observed?

     sure but that raises an interesting point

5.5.18  5:37 pm   do you have any thoughts on socks and sandals

     not since pineapple and pizza have i seen a more perfect combination

5.5.18  5:20 pm   any tips on how to be happy?

     the answer may surprise you

5.5.18  5:07 pm   who is jesus?

     there are many people named jesus

5.5.18  5:07 pm   what's your theory

     everything is more than it is

5.5.18  5:01 pm   you say everything you've ever seen is an inspiration, so does this mean you have been taken away by a spaceship into the moonlight, been touched in an interesting way by the drivers of the spaceship then made pregnant with aliens? 

     no

5.5.18  4:54 pm   what keyboard sound did you use at the beginning of "we could just get high"? i'm looking for a soundfont with that rock organ sound but can't find any. thanks!

     i think you may discover that using multiple sounds blended together will open up just the right doors for you

5.5.18  4:51 pm   What is wrong with ur life

     it might actually be too good

5.5.18  2:53 pm   what's the most unlikely thing in the universe?

     nothing

5.5.18  2:52 pm   i got a new puppy what should i name him?

     My Puppy

5.5.18  2:52 pm   do you feel any of the things humans do?

     yes

5.5.18  2:37 pm   is george harrison getting alot of talented music artist

     sure

5.5.18  12:57 pm   Have you ever listened to any songs that are not sang in English?

     yes

5.5.18  12:55 pm   Can you sing all your songs from memory?

     not even close

5.5.18  12:33 pm   did you have any inspiration for your music

     everything i've ever seen heard or been through

5.5.18  12:27 pm   did you really fall in love on the Q train?

     with music, although i was already in love with music

5.5.18  11:42 am   If you could be reincarnated into something or someone else, who or what would it be?

     everything, in due time

5.5.18  10:27 am   what if the haters dab back?

     dab back again. perhaps double dab

5.5.18  10:23 am   suggestion: make the "i'm feeling randy" button say "i'm feeling lovely"

     the button needs to relate to the word "random" in some way, because it is the button to get to the question randomizer

5.5.18  6:16 am   how did you learn to do music?

     by rigorous exploration, contemplation, and experimentation

5.5.18  6:02 am   how do you do things

     it's more fun if you don't know

5.5.18  5:28 am   what disney princess do you want to be?

     walt disney

5.5.18  4:45 am   how do i get to scarmble thingy

     here

5.5.18  4:13 am   5.3.18  3:29 pm what genre would your music be classified in

     ah, deciding that would be the job of the genre police. and my job would be to try to escape from them

     and do you have any sites where i can read more on this genre

     bill wurtz dot com is the best source i can think of, although i prefer to listen rather than read about music. but you can do that here too

5.5.18  3:59 am   How does a person who learned music by themselves know what "level" they're at?

     how would a person who learned music amongst others know what level they're at

5.5.18  3:46 am   who is the best music artist ?

     it's a tie

5.5.18  3:44 am   do you produce late at night or do you do the 9-5

     both

5.5.18  2:19 am   What's the dumbest thing you ever did when you were little?

     was smart

5.5.18  2:15 am   may i sing a song?

     sure. thanks for checking with me first

5.5.18  2:05 am   what would happen if a tuna sandwich crashed into earth at the speed of light?

     it would turn into every other type of sandwich and then turn into every other type of non-sandwich, before hitting the ground. in theory the entire rest of the universe would also turn into every other thing, before the sandwich (or non-sandwich) hits the ground which also may not be there by that time

5.5.18  1:26 am   ok im the same person that wrote that paragraph trying to explain why people thought you were depressed and i've revised my thesis: Most people think you are depressed because of the reoccurring themes you have in your music, including the one about not being able to go home

     i think those lines strengthen the content, and i also don't think the individual lines are depressing either

5.5.18  1:23 am   5.4.18  3:09 am
I thought it was the one with the pancake roof or whatever

     2.14.18  5:04 pm, 2.8.18  4:00 pm, 2.1.18  11:05 pm, 1.30.18  7:45 pm, 1.30.18  5:36 pm

5.5.18  12:32 am   What is your favourite flavor of sandwich?

     lunch munch

5.4.18  11:15 pm   How are you always so active?

     it's a survival strategy

5.4.18  10:59 pm   can you drink out of the stanley cup 

     seems to be more of a bowl, but sure

5.4.18  10:48 pm   is science overrated? 

     everyone gets to choose their own rating for science

5.4.18  9:58 pm   How do you accomplish life?

     there must be 100 different ways

5.4.18  9:45 pm   what would you recommend on reducing the amount of procrastination while doing a task?

     you could use the task to distract yourself from the procrastination

5.4.18  9:04 pm   Fam do you think knowledge of music theory is neccesary to enjoy and appreciate music?

     other way around

      Do you think people should know more than they generally do about music theory?

     it's all made up anyway, based on the enjoyment and appreciation of music. in fact, music is so wonderful that each time you try to make up some theories, the music turns right around and runs in a different direction, like a game of cat and mouse (the music is the mouse)

5.4.18  8:43 pm   how do you hold chopsticks

     with style

5.4.18  8:35 pm   are you a hardcore athiest

     no
